tool_description: This API reproduces PUBLIC data and features of Ulta.com website/application in realtime and on demand
name: Unofficial Ulta
title: Unofficial Ulta

api_list.name: products/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of a product

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The value of ... -> modules -> items -> action -> url field returned in .../products/list endpoint

api_list.name: reviews/list
api_list.description: List reviews belonging to a product

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The value of ... -> modules -> items -> action -> url field returned in .../products/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page index for paging purpose

api_list.name: brands/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unofficial-ulta.p.rapidapi.com/brands/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unofficial-ulta.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: products/list
api_list.description: List products with options and filters

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The value of \"url\" field returned in .../auto-complete and .../brands/list OR \"navTargetLink\" field returned in .../categories/list OR \"applyFilterUrl, applySortUrl, loadMoreUrl\" fields returned right in this endpoint to apply options and filters.

api_list.name: auto-complete
api_list.description: Get suggestions by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: Any term or words you are familiar with
